name: European Federation of Bilateral Chambers of Commerce
goal: The European Federation of Bilateral Chambers of Commerce is a structure of European interest, private legal entity, autonomous, nongovernmental, apolitical and non-profit organization. It's purpose is to develop and maintain the relationship inside the European business environment and also to broaden the areas of economic cooperation between the Federation members
interests: External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Regional Policy
